mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, USER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REG FROM (SELECT QNA_NO, USER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM QNA) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(QNA_NO) FROM QNA WHERE 1=1
AND QNA_NO > 0
SELECT u.USER_NO,q.QNA_NO, q.QNA_TYPE, q.USER_ID, q.QNA_TITLE, q.QNA_CONTENT FROM QNA q LEFT JOIN USER_INFO u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE q.QNA_NO = #{qna_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA VALUES(QNA_NOSQ.NEXTVAL, QNA_GPNOSQ.NEXTVAL, 1, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{user_id}, SYSDATE , #{qna_type})
